poem_en: He had an enlarged heart. I thought it was from his love. Turns out, it was the burgers. But it taught me: there's no limit to how many people you can love— or burgers.
poem_it: Aveva un cuore ingrandito. Pensavo fosse per il suo amore. Alla fine, erano proprio i panini. Ma mi ha insegnato: non c'è limite a quanti puoi amare— o panini.
